Introduction

Jin Hyeon-ju, more commonly known as Belle, formerly known as Lucky, is a Filipino-Korean singer signed to J9 Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group, cignature, and a former member of the girl group, GOOD DAY, and their Morning sub-unit. She is well-known for her appearances on the survival shows, 'The Unit', and 'Universe Ticket'. She made it to the final lineup of UNIS.
